name: Metria Network
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Metria Network is Creating a Truly Accessible & Affordable Decentralized Infrastructure for New-age DeFi and NFT Applications. It will be a multichain platform that offers a well-chosen set of features and enhancements transforming the blockchain space from “something new” to an imperative, high-growth industry.
